body:
Hi all,


I'm running a number of annual glare analysis using gen_dgp_profile and it
randomly gives me "ds_illum.exe stopped working " error. Interestingly
enough when I close the error. The study keeps running and returns some
[wrong] results.


The error looks to be view dependent as it works fine for some views and
not for the other ones. Anybody has encountered similar issue and/or knows
the solution?


Thanks in advance,
Mostapha


PS: I'm using Daysim 4.0 and Here is the view file:


rview Perspective -vth -vp 2.004 5.478 1.496  -vd -0.526326 -2.530093 0.0
-vu 0.0 0.0 1.0  -vh 180.000 -vv 180.000 -vs 0.000 -vl 0.000 -x 250 -y 250
